title: Dead City
description: Librarian note: alternative-cover edition of B0078B8D0I"And so it begins... the glorious, bloody beginning of the Zombie D.O.A. saga."On a beautiful early-fall evening a vagrant stumbles into Times Square and attacks a tourist, setting off a deadly chain of events that might just spell the end of the world as we know it.For Chris Collins it certainly feels that way - an up and coming boxer on the eve of the biggest fight of his career and with his wife due to give birth any day, Chris is about to lose everything to an act of unspeakable brutality.Now he's been cast into the midst of a zombie apocalypse - a terrifying world of flesh eating monsters, murderous hobos, trigger-happy militias, and bloodthirsty street gangs.Then there's the hitman with a hidden agenda, the thug who wants to be 'King of New York," and Ruby - just one day old but already equipped with teeth and nails, and a taste for pureed beef.
author: J.J. Zep
